description: Solucorp Industries, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops and markets metal remediation technologies and solutions for the protection of families, communities, and the environment. It offers Molecular Bonding System technology that remediates various metal contaminants in mediums, including soil, sludge, slag, sediment, baghouse dust, and flyash; develops and promotes Integrated Fixation Systems (IFS) RE-ME-DI-ATE products that prevent pollution at source, as well as protects families and environment from toxic heavy metal contaminants; and holds patents for an Electrocoagulation technology for the treatment of wastewater and other aqueous waste streams by using electrical currents that de-stabilize currents suspended emulsified or dissolved contaminants. The company's IFS technology is also used in making ammunition to prevent future lead contamination at gun ranges and military installations. Solucorp Industries, Ltd. was formerly known as World Tec Industries Inc. Solucorp Industries, Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Orangeburg, New York.
